sub_title: Exploring Alternative Economics | Post Growth Institute | WEAll.org
summary:
Interesting initiatives to broaden your mind:

postgrowth.org | offersandneeds.com | follow-this.org | simpol.org | gabv.org | energyandourfuture.org | consilienceproject.org

Alex is an adventurous and creative person with a wide area of interests. Important values to him are equity, autonomy and harmony. As an adventurer Alex likes to fully understand issues or challenges. He will often ask the why-question and dares to think and act differently. Colleagues and friends appreciate his ability to connect with others, including people with diverse cultural backgrounds, that he applies in engaging stakeholders. His creative side expresses itself through visualisations, branding, facilitating workshops and his humour. Alex is passionate about economic system change and is already contributing to this as a conscious consumer and green investor (Triodos Bank, Broccoli.eu, follow-this.org). We need to move from EconoME to valYOU.

Alex would like to contribute to societal, scientific, environmental or cultural goals in which profit is viewed as a means and not a goal. Interesting areas are social entrepreneurship, social design and (radical) circular economy. He has experience as researcher, analyst, workshop creator and facilitator, knowledge manager, onboarding manager, learning and development officer and since he’s a quick learner do not hesitate to reach out with other positions. He's located in The Netherlands for the moment but open to discuss relocations (preferably places where English is spoken sufficiently).

Reach out in case you have an opportunity to discuss or if you just wish to connect and have a coffee.

Sources of inspiration include minimalism, hitchhiking and volunteering experiences, Commons (Ostrom, Bollier, Monbiot), De Correspondent (Research Journalism), Doughnut Economics, Economy Transformers (economytransformers.nl), Wellbeing Economics (WEAll.org), Degrowth, Indigenous wisdom (Krznaric/Yunkaporta), Post Growth (Institute), Post Growth Entrepreneurship, Permaculture, Purpose Economics (Kees Klomp), Regenerative Economics (Capital Institute), Regenesis (Daniel Christian Wahl), Rudolf Steiner (Social Triad), Sacred Economics, Systems Thinking (Meadows), The Great Simplification (energyandourfuture.org), The Web of Meaning (Jeremy Lent), Triodos Bank etc.

awards.title: Push The Boundaries of the Possible
awards.description: Demonstrating creative growth mindset, ambassadorship for the new strategy and focusing on continuous feedback.

courses.name: Symposium Corporate Social Responsibility (Study Assocation POLIS)

profile_positions.description:
The PGI is an international, not-for-profit organization working to enable collective wellbeing within ecological limits. More info: postgrowth.org (What is a not-for-profit organization? https://lnkd.in/ddEAMeRu)

I support the PGI's Offer and Needs Market (OANM) which is a guided process where people meet (virtually, or in-person) to identify and exchange passions, knowledge, skills, resources, opportunities, and needs. Apart from hosting these markets the OANM also hosts facilitator trainings so globally more people can harvest the fruits of sharing! Check out: offersandneeds.com. My support consists of taking care of the database, facilitating the continuous learning process and contributing to business development and communications.
profile_positions.title: Contributing to a revival of the commons through data care and facilitation

profile_positions.description:
• Researched internal performance management and advised to adapt the HR cycle and support it with tooling to realize a distinctive capacity in the market.
• Attracted new talent by identifying and utilizing new recruitment channels.
• Identified sales opportunities and leads by researching potential client organizations.
• Developed a new service: DevOps maturity scan.
• Structured and improved internal knowledge assurance, sharing and growth.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Driving the strategic thinking of the employees of the IT organization by developing a workshop around the strategic themes.
• Scrum Master of a ten-headed cross-domain team with the goal of building an IT-hub by creating visibility on the labor market, attract talent and continuously improve the recruitment and on-boarding experience.
• Driving the decentralized decision-making among the employees of the IT organization through an interactive campaign.

Certified SAFe® 5 Agilist (SA)
Power BI - Dashboard in a Day Training
Splunk For Rookies Course
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master and Driving Change to Enable Growth!

profile_positions.description:
• Contributed to six global IT project (PRINCE2®) with the goals of reducing
tax exposure, improve supply chain flexibility and enabling sub-contracting services.
• Coordinated data migrations, testing and (knowledge) handovers from project
IT to business support.
• Driving the updating of process and change documentation of the ERP-domain with the goal of reducing total cost of ownership.
profile_positions.title: PMO

profile_positions.description:
• Visualized the competence center awareness by translating 30+ internal interviews to a matrix.
• To improve the competence center awareness I advised to use a different approach, link competence centers to business priorities and appoint ambassadors throughout all layers of the organization.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for supervising on compliance with legislation with regard to the decontamination of asbestos. 
- Describing and improving the current administrative process.
- Executive role in a project for municipality of Bergen op Zoom including data analysis and data translation.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Supervisor Asbestos

profile_positions.description:
Together with 11 other people I was responsible for the organization of the lustrum of Study Association POLIS. We organised 13 activities including a member weekend, two conferences, charity work, gala and dinner.  

As chairman I was responsible for breaking the long term goal into short term goals and monitoring the progress along the way. During this year I severely improved my planning, communication and organizing skills.
profile_positions.title: Chairman Lustrum Committee

profile_positions.description:
The Social Business Days Committee is a career event for the Tilburg School of Social and Behavioral Sciences. The aim of the event is to improve the connection between students of social studies and the social side of the labor market. Hence, the slogan “connecting people, business and society.” 

I supervised the contacts that four subcommittees have with organizations from different fields. Besides that I also actively engaged with organizations myself in order to secure a diverse and interesting reflection of the social labor market. Together we managed to organize a successful first edition.
profile_positions.title: Public Relations

profile_positions.description: Word Actief Tilburg (WAT) is an initiative by students for students. The main goal of this foundation is making students aware of extracurricular activities. WAT provides an overview of the associations in Tilburg and informs students on the vacancies. I helped in the development of this concept and acquired funds for the starting period.
profile_positions.title: Acquisition Manager

profile_positions.description:
The goal of the Stukafest Tilburg Foundation is to unlock the cultural world for students by organizing a festival spread across the city that hosts a large diversity of acts including poets, theater, musical workshops, singer-songwriters and bands. 

As a treasurer I kept track of the bookkeeping and also managed to raise funds in new ways for the foundation by organizing crowdfunding and allowing local companies to sponsor certain acts.
profile_positions.title: Treasurer

volunteer_experiences.description: One activity of the fifth lustrum of Study Association POLIS involved charity work for Libra Foundation. We organized a day where students could play sports and have lunch with children and grown-ups with physical, mental or cognitive disabilities.

3piedras foundation (3piedras.org) stimulates the repopulation of the rural areas  of Aragon, such as Ara, by organizing artistic, cultural and environmental events and workshops. 

I've aided the foundation with database maintenance, research in similar initiatives abroad and property maintenance in and around the community hall. All in all, an enriching experience in a warm community.

In return for my time and effort accomodation and food were covered.

company.name: Unochenta - Spain - Almería, Uleila del Campo

In return for my time and effort accomodation and food were covered.
